# Preparation

## Loading libraries

```{r load-libraries, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tximport)
library(GenomicFeatures)
library(tidyr)
library(DESeq2)
library(pheatmap)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(org.Hs.eg.db)
library(EnhancedVolcano)
```

```{r}
linux <- read.csv("results/results_Octavia.csv")
windows <- read.csv("results/RE_quant.norm_20240419.csv", row.names = 1)
```

```{r}
windows %>% 
    pivot_longer(cols = everything(), names_to = "sample", values_to = "value") %>%
    mutate(value = log(value)) %>%
        ggplot(aes(x=sample, y=value)) +
            geom_boxplot() +
            scale_y_continuous(limits = c(-7, 3))

windows %>%
    pivot_longer(cols = everything(), names_to = "sample", values_to = "value") %>%
    mutate(value = log(value)) %>%
        ggplot(aes(x=sample, y=value)) +
            geom_boxplot() +
            scale_y_continuous(limits = c(-7, 3))
```
